full_text: RETURNING RESIDENT ALIENS A permanent resident alien who stays outside the United States for a period of over one year on his Alien Registration Receipt Card (Green/ Blue Card) or beyond the expiry date of a Reentry Permit, can qualify for a special immigrant visa as a Returning Resident of the United States He had the status of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence at the time of his departure from the United States; he departed from the United States with the intention of returning thereto and has not abandoned this intention and he is returning to the United States from a temporary visit abroad and, if his stay abroad was protracted, that such stay was caused by reasons beyond his control DVSE and for which he was not responsible. POLICEB In order for the Consular Officer to determine whether you can qualify for status as a Returning Resident, please fill out the following: 1.
